attributes.action: give every Asthmatic free NHS prescriptions,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
People who suffer from Asthma were born with the disease.
Asthma sufferers need their medication if it is not managed death can follow with a fatal attack i personally lost my great-grandfather at the age of 37,i am sure if inhalers/medications were free he might have lived to old age.I have also lost two friends to the deadly disease. Thyroidism,diabetics have free prescriptions why can't we?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
